name: Oha soup
description: The most complete Oha Soup meal, just like your grandmas made them.

name: Ofe Nsala
description: Want to warm your way to your in-laws’ hearts? Serve them this delicacy.

name: Bitterleaf Soup (Ofe Onugbu)
description: Don’t let the name put you off this delicious soup. A well-prepared Bitterleaf Soup should not be bitter.

name: Peppered Turkey Wings
description: Peppered Turkey Wings is one of the best side dishes to Nigerian rice dish. Great for parties too

name: Barbecue Chicken Wings
description: If you need a great evening or picnic snack, here you go.

name: Peppered Chicken
description: The popping red spicy upgrade for the basic Grilled Chicken. A great addition to your meals!
